name: Wayne Moir
text: The best

name: Garey/Val Reid
text:
Dr. Mahmoud gave me a second chance at life! A previous surgery that went so wrong at an out of state hospital on my lower back resulted in my having to use a walker all of the time! It was so awful and I was in so much pain all of the time. Various other treatments with other doctors helped a small amount big didn't last.
When I met Dr. Mahmoud,
he suggested a trial of a spinal cord stimulator. The trial went perfectly! A few weeks later the permanent unit was put in and I can now walk without a walker and enjoy life again! I'm so grateful for this second chance at life! Thank you Dr. Mahmoud!

name: evelyn violette
text: I never went there

name: Laurie McCoy
text: Awesome doctor and nursing staff tooüôè dr. Mahmoud is the best pain doctor aroundüòÄ I would go back to him anytime for pain management he helped me walk again without pain all I take now for pain medicine is Tylenol and ibuprofen for my pain issues with my back. Thank you again Dr. Mahmoud for your help.‚úåÔ∏èü§†

name: Katrina King
text: The staff are all extremely nice. The minute you walk in you are greeted and they point you in the right direction. Nurses are excellent, treat you with the most respect. Dr. Ammar Mahmoud Is wonderful, very friendly! He is very good at what he does and makes sure you are comfortable and cared for. Nurses at his side also making sure you comfortable and cared for. You could not get better treatment than them. I am very grateful for having such a wonderful team trying to help relieve my joint pain. 100% recommend !

name: Elsie Martinolich
text: The entire staff and Dr Mamood are professional and very helpfulüëç

name: Judith Ellery
text: I would highly recommend Dr Mahmoud to anyone. He was very friendly and caring and listened to what I had to say and asked questions when needed. My experience with him reminded me of what doctors used to be when I was young. I look forward to seeing him again.

name: Amy Gagnon
text: This doctor is the kindest, most compassionate, resourceful man around. I honestly feel like he‚Äôs helped me get my life back-One step at a time. Thank you for treating the whole person every visit!

name: Rebecca Williams
text: He is the most amazing human on earth. Kind, caring, compassionate, and helpful. I left the office with a little hope, and a plan to get me feeling better. Top notch. I hope he never leaves.

name: T F
text: Dr. Mahmoud is one of the best Drs I‚Äôve had. He has great bedside manner, and truly try‚Äôs to help you. He has been my pain Dr. for nearly three years. I highly recommend him to people with chronic pain issues.

name: Mary Webster
text: Dr. Mahmoud is very good at what he does & good at explaining what is going to take place. He is also very professional.

name: William Irvine
text: I was well taken care of. I felt I was in good hands. Dr Mahmoud was sympathetic and professional.

name: Rodena Clowry
text: Dr Mahmouds office staff were great and he actually listens to what you say!!  Very nice doctor. We talked about some things to try and I am very hopeful they will will work!

name: Sharon Musetti
text: Very satisfied and kind, professional doctor.

name: Sherry Felbab
text: I‚Äôve had this knee issue for SO long! Doc Mahmoud was kind, sweet, and caring. It felt like he heard me, not just listening. Definitely recommend

name: Janet Pease
text: Am always l impressed with the wonderful bedside manners of the medical crew andyou dr Mahmoud and your staff.

name: Stephanie Fournier
text: I just met dr M for the first time with my daughter. He was the most gentle, compassionate doctor I‚Äôve ever met, both with her and with me.  She has developmental delays and he carefully explained what he would do so she understood. No doc has ever taken the time or had the understanding to do that before.

name: Dale Clark
text: Fast easy process. Dr Mahmoud is very pleasant and very knowledgeable explained things every step of the way. Great Patient to Dr experience. His staff were amazing as well couldn‚Äôt have asked for better.

name: JoAnn Estes
text: Dr. Mahmoud is very kind and I trust him completely.

name: Debra Andrews
text:
Really good experience, everyone was super and let me know what was happening and they were very quick.
Calvin Andrews

name: william mason
text: Dr Mahmoud  is awesome

name: Survival King
text: He is caring and such a smart and loving Doctor! He cares and wants to make sure that you are feeling better and doing better ! His work as a doctor is the highest standards for anyone i know! He is so personal , He makes you feel as he is part of your own family ! For me , I feel like he was a fellow collages friend ! I gave him 5 stars for his knowledge and love for the care and compassion !! Northern lights need more doctors and staff that are just as caring! *****

name: Teri Gerson
text: Staff are friendly, attentive, and reassuring. Dr. Mahmoud is kind, gentle, caring, and effective.

name: Paula Ballesteros
text: He explained my X-rays.  Asked me if I had questions or concerns, we decided on the first course of action.  Good experience

name: Smitty Smith
text:
I‚Äôd been suffering from chronic low back pain and per doctors advice; I have had a fusion  of L3 and L4.
I was told that the pain was caused by football and my a down player (center, guard or tackle) in high school and college.
The fusion didn‚Äôt help at all, and it was at that point that I started started taking opiates for the pain and at one point I was taking 150 milligrams of Morphine Sulfate ER daily.helped; until it didn‚Äôt. I was told the solution to my pain was to implant a spinal cord stimulator my days of excruciating pain would be reduced if.not totally gone.
BUT THAT WAS NOT THE  CASE!
I was talked into having another SCS implanted  in 2021 and it worked great for about a month and then quit working permanently.
Last Thursday I had a pain pump implanted and when I came of the sedation I I was 100%pain free for the time in 25 years and am still pain free!!

name: Mary Cheney
text: He's amazing

name: Becky Wiseman
text: Dr Mahmoud was very patient and understanding. He took the time to understand my extensive health history and explained what the next steps were.

name: Suzanna Nadeau
text: Very intelligent and compassionate. Would highly recommend.

name: kirk thompson
text: Dr Mahmoud and his team have always been very professional, creating an atmosphere of confidence and comfort.  I appreciate the conservative approach to my case and the collaborativeness offered.  I do wish that the results of the procedures we more long term.

name: Shaelynn Marie
text: Very kind and thorough. I was very pleased with my visit with him

name: Heather Cooney
text: I had an exceptional experience with Dr. Mahmoud and the entire team when I received a spinal injection. Thank you!

name: Joe Babbitt
text: I am also a medical professional.  Dr. Mahmoud did a great job balancing treating me as a patient while respecting me as a peer.  I am very confident in his care.

name: Richard Rossi
text: Dr MahMoud was very professional and explained everything in a way I can understand.  He was definitely knowledgeable in the field of new technology for pain management

name: Rebecca Hosley
text: Doctor Mahmoud is the best! He always makes me feel comfortable and I know I am in good hands.

name: Brigitte
text:
My husband had an appointment yesterday.  We met Dr. Mahmoud and his assistants.  They were all extremely nice.  Dr. Mahmoud was very helpful in explaining my husband's condition and gave several options in order for us to move forward.  We feel very confident in his diagnosis and are thankful for his service.  I would highly recommend him to anyone needing his services.
Brigitte and Eric

name: Donna White
text: The office and exam rooms were clean and orderly.
